StagingArea_key1: Apne `file` ko **git add** karte hi aapki `file` ki ek copy staging area mein ban jaati hai.
StagingArea_key2: Aap abhi bhi Working directory mein apne `file` mein changes kar sakte hain. Apne txt `file` jisme aapne story ki beginning likhi hai -usme kuch edits kijye - maybe characters ke naam change kijiye.
StagingArea_key3: `Terminal` mein apne directory mein navigate karke:
StagingArea_key5: `Output` mein aap apne naye `file` aur purane `file` mein difference yani kya kya changes hue hai wo dekh payenge.
StagingArea_key7: Git ke documentation mein **git diff** ke baare mein padhiye.
StagingArea_key8:
Usi directory mein koi doosra `file` create kijiye. 
Fir usey staging area mein add kijiye. 
git command se apne directory ke *tracked* aur *untracked* `files` ka status dekhiye. 
Iss `file` mein kuch changes kar ke **git diff** command run kijiye.
Wapas se git status run karke `output` dekhiye.
Apne working directory ke edited `file` ko wapas se Staging area mein add kijiye. "git diff" command run karke wapas se staging area aur working directory ke `files` ke beech ka difference dekhiye. Ideally abhi koi difference nahi hona chahiye.
